description: owned and occupied by the client or rented to a third party for residential purposes by the client or owned and occupied by a third party
up to floors, owned and occupied by the client or rented to a third party for residential purposes by the client or owned and occupied by a third party
belonging to a house used for residential purposes

whole building of a construction company or building with shop/office on the ground floor and flat on the upper floor, if the floor area of the flat is more than 50% of the total floor area of building
part of a building with clear property boundaries, used for administrative purposes
whole building, more than 50% of the area is used for administrative purposes
part of a building with clear property boundaries or whole small building, used for commercial purposes
part of a building of a whole building used for a restaurant, or more than 50% of the area used for a restaurant
whole building, more than 50% of the area is used for commercial purposes which is not a hotel or a restaurant
whole building, more than 50% used as a hotel, may include a lobby and restaurant
production and storage premise in residential areas
production and storage premise outside residential areas
gas station, including the plot, the building, filling stations, parking lot, penthouse and underground facilities
unspecified property for industrial or logistic purposes
building with adjacent terrain used for agriculture purposes
land devoted to agriculture by the law and actively used for it's purpose
land with permission for construction or assigned for construction by state urban plans or land with a building, which is not used as a mortgage by the client
land where state urban plans do not allow construction or allow limited construction works such as park alleys, small pavilion, children playground, etc.
mobile machines that transport passengers or cargo
machinery and equipment used for agriculture purposes
tangible property that is used in the operation of a business, such as devices, machines, tools and production lines
other machinery and equipment

materials and goods held by a company to support production (raw materials, work in process), for support activities (repair, maintenance, consumables) or for sale or customer service (merchandise, finished goods, spare parts) owned by the client
amount due from a customer employee, supplier or any other reliable counterparty
domestic animals such as cattle, raised for home use or for profit by the client
deposits in acceptable currency
shares in companies,guarantees, debt instruments, equity securities, promissory notes, treasury bills,
The whole enterprise acts as a collateral
assets not included in the other categories
